00036 // Called once for each event in the main event loop
00037 // Return non-zero to indicate a problem and terminate the event loop
00038 int PulseCandidateFinder_InvestigateParameters::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00039 
00040   // Prepare a few variables
00041   std::string bankname, detname;
00042   PulseIslandList thePulseIslands;
00043   StringPulseIslandMap::const_iterator it;
00044 
00045   // Loop over each detector
00046   for(it = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.begin(); it != gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.end(); ++it){
00047     
00048     // Get the bank and detector names for this detector
00049     bankname = it->first;
00050     detname = setup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00051 
00052     // Create the pulse candidate finder for this detector
00053     PulseCandidateFinder* pulse_candidate_finder = new PulseCandidateFinder(detname, fOpts);  
00054 
00055     // Get the TPIs
00056     thePulseIslands = it->second;
00057     if (thePulseIslands.size() == 0) continue; // no pulses here..
00058 
00059     // Create the histogram that will store all the parameter values that we will look at to determine the best values
00060     if (fParameterHistograms.find(detname) == fParameterHistograms.end()) {
00061       int num_bins = 10000;
00062       int max_value = 7500;
00063       std::string histname = "fParameterHistogram_" + detname;
00064       TH1D* histogram = new TH1D(histname.c_str(), histname.c_str(), num_bins, max_value-num_bins, max_value);
00065       fParameterHistograms[detname] = histogram;
00066     }
00067 
00068     // Get the parameter histogram for this detector
00069     TH1D* parameter_histogram = fParameterHistograms[detname];
00070 
00071     // Loop through all the pulses
00072     for (PulseIslandList::iterator pulseIter = thePulseIslands.begin(); pulseIter != thePulseIslands.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00073 
00074       // Find the pulse candidates on this TPulseIsland and then fill the parameter histogram
00075       pulse_candidate_finder->FindPulseCandidates(*pulseIter);
00076       pulse_candidate_finder->FillParameterHistogram(parameter_histogram);
00077 
00078       // Use to export pulses (NB you will only want to run rootana on a few events to stop the output being large)
00079       int n_pulse_candidates = pulse_candidate_finder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00080       if (Debug()) {
00081         if (n_pulse_candidates > 0) {
00082           //      ExportPulse::Instance()->AddToExportList(detname, pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin());
00083           if (n_pulse_candidates > 1) {
00084             std::cout << detname << "(" << bankname << "): Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " has " << n_pulse_candidates << " pulse candidates\n"; 
00085           }
00086         }
00087       } // end if Debug
00088     } // end loop through pulses
00089   } //  end loop through detectors
00090 
00091   return 0;
00092 }
00093
